data.title: Great guide, stories helped understand,entrance hard to find
data.author: Cecile – Canada

data.title: Iconic Airport
data.message: A must visit for aviation and architecture enthousiasts. Excellent guide with detailed knowledge. Value for money on this 2 hour time warp trip.
data.author: Philip – Germany

data.title: Excellent! An amazing tour guide with his own interesting style.
data.author: joshua – Germany

data.title: Fascinating tour
data.message: Very interesting experience. Lots of stairs so a good workout!
data.author: Lucy

data.title: Unbelievable site you have to discover !
data.message: Céline was an excellent guide : she knows her subject, has updated informations and took her distances with all the myths you can listen/read about the Tempelhof airport. This 2 hours walk in different rooms and floors was totally great. To see this part of History (and aeronautics) is amazing. A whole empty airpoirt for the group where you can imagine parts of daily history but also see the details of architecture, organization, uses throughout the times etc. Highly recommanded! Be carreful to arrive 10 minutes at least before the visit starts for with your ticket.
data.author: Marie – France

data.title: Interesting with a bit of vintage
data.author: Claire – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Interesting place. Guide could’ve been more engaging.
data.message: Interesting to learn about the airport. Saw many places throughout the airport. I’ve had more entertaining guides before, but she seemed well-informed.
data.author: Robin – Spain

data.title: fantastic place with passinate tour guide
data.message:
The tempelhof is definitely a fantastic place with lots of mysterious stories and history to discover. The tour guide was really passionate and shared lots of interesting things about selective rooms and places.

I can feel his love with the job he is doing at tempelhof(I think he probably works there), and I wish there are more options with longer hours so people really interested in it can have more time to stay and discover.
data.author: Sirui – China

data.title: Enlightening!
data.message: For those thinking this is just an old ghost airport to tick off the list of things to see think again! This tour was amazing and enlightening and when you arrive it strikes you at the sheer vastness of the site. Only with the tour can you see and appreciate the significant parts and why this place is so special. The guide was brilliant, he was engaging and very knowledgeable and definitely worthy of a time slot on your schedule!
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer

data.message: Amazing airport with a very interesting history
data.author: Tom – Germany

data.title: Amazing tour,with super guide
data.message: A must see when in Berlin
data.author: Michael – Ireland

data.message: Amazing experience to see the inside of such a historical place. Really reasonably priced for what you see, our tour guide Tom knew all sorts about the building and explained everything in great detail. Only downside is there are lots of steps and not many places to sit if you struggle walking. 10/10 would definitely recommend to everyone who is visiting Berlin.
data.author: Lucie – United Kingdom

data.title: Pretty cool tour.
data.message: Really nice tour, it’s really through and you learn a lot about history. Full 2 hours, you see many cool parts of the airport not accessible otherwise. The tour guide was good. Great value for money.
data.author: Morana – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Nice tour! Very special to see Tempelhof behind the scenes.
data.author: M – Netherlands

data.title: The tour was very well organised and presented
data.author: Douglas – United Kingdom

data.title: Amazing Visit!
data.message: Absolutely amazing tour, great place to visit and our guide was fantastic!
data.author: David – United Kingdom

data.title: A must do when in Berlin
data.message:
I took this tour last week and it was really enjoyable, the guide was very knowledgable as one would expect and dhe had a good sense of humour.
The two hour tour just raced by, l would recommend this tour the next timw you travel to Berlin. The tour start point was easy to find.
data.author: Rob – United Kingdom

data.title: Brilliant
data.message: This tour is absolutely fantastic. Very atmospheric you get to see virtually everything from the roof to the bunkers.
data.author: Simon – United Kingdom

data.title: Good tour, a nice mix of history and architecture
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Germany

data.title: Excellent!
data.message: A very knowledgable and hardworking guide made it a very special experience.
data.author: Richard – United Kingdom

data.title: Informative and fascinating.
data.message: Informative and fascinating. A look at both public and some hidden areas of a phenomenal piece of 1930s design and engineering with a very well presented explanation of the building's history and uses through its 80-year life
data.author: Dudley – United Kingdom

data.title: Amazing piece of living history, visit while you still can!
data.message: Well worth it if you have any interest in any kind of history
data.author: Richard

data.title: Great experience, worth it!
data.message: Great experience and good valze for money.
data.author: Petr – Czech Republic

data.title: Very nice idea
data.message: It's perfect if you're interested röntge history of Berlin
data.author: Mark – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Great tour!
data.message: Informative and fun!
data.author: Amadeu – Germany

data.title: Fantastic tour with insightful information
data.message: Good quality tour. A must see for history buffs. It's about the right length. Even my 11 year old son said: "It was interesting and fun!"
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer

data.title: Great
data.message: Great
data.author: Kelly – Switzerland

data.title: Enlightening visit of the past
data.message: Incredibly interesting tour of a building that was not just an airport. The complex is full of historical significance. Tour guide was knowledgable, however sometimes a bit superficial in his storytelling. Booking process was smooth and the app is useful as you don't have to print the tickets
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Fascinating information.
data.message:
The number of steps (up & down) is far more than ever expected; a bit challenging at times. Except near end of tour, finally a place to sit. Group a bit larger than hoped. Tour guide obviously well versed on Templehof and that is appreciated. I learned far more about Templehof than I ever imagined.
It was a challenge finding check-in location. We walked a fair distance around property before finding GAT. Maybe walking directions from the nearest U-Bahn stop.
data.author: Catherine – United States

data.title: Interesting
data.message: Two hours went by like a half an hour, we were able to learn a lot about Tempelhof and we heared a lot of cool and unknown facts.
data.author: Nina – Slovenia

data.title: A must do when in Berlin
data.message:
Great tour of how the history and a chance to see things unique to the tour.
Very informative.
data.author: DAVID – United Kingdom

data.title: A Must do
data.message:
excellent, a great 2 hour tour with enough information and history of the building
highly recommended and a "must do" if you're in Berlin
data.author: ianto – United Kingdom

data.title: Great tour!
data.message: Very interesting trip through a building rich with history. The guide was very knowledgeable about the history and function of the airport in different time periods. Highly recommended!
data.author: David – Germany

data.title: s.u.
data.message: s.u.
data.author: Claudia – Germany

data.title: Well worth taking in.
data.message: A fantastic piece of engineering and construction. Tour guide was very knowledgeable and enthusiastic. You need to be prepared to do stairs- there are lots of them.
data.author: Alisdair – United Kingdom

data.title: what to say here
data.message: Great tour for historians but a little long and I wouldn't recommend it for people with disabilities or mobility issues which I don't think is mentioned at all
data.author: Michael L – United States

data.title: great tour and great staff
data.message:
We gott lost and had trouble finding the entrance. Therefore we arrived late - the Templehof staff rescheduled our visit, they were amazing!
And the tour was great too!
data.author: Anne-Cécile – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Very interesting and insightful
data.message: A building worth seeing
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – France

data.title: Very informative trip.
data.message: Very nice trip. Lots of information and history. The guide is very knowledgeable.
data.author: Elmagdad – United Arab Emirates

data.title: Phantastisch!
data.message: This an excellent tour.
data.author: William – United States

data.title: Excellent guide and very informative tour.
data.message: The guide was both knowledgeable and very entertaining. Really worthwhile taking this tour of this fascinating building with its complex history.
data.author: Michael – Australia

data.title: Excellent guide -- very knowledgeable.
data.message: Learned so much about a part of history I knew very little. Excellent guide -- very knowledgeable.
data.author: Cheryl – United States

data.title: Glad I did the tour
data.message: Highly recommend this tour, I've been to Temlpehof Field plenty of time but never inside the terminal, the tour was very insightful. Our tour guide was very informative and personable, I enjoyed every minute of it.
data.author: Gary – United States

data.title: Fascinating
data.message: Very good, thorough and Informative...
data.author: Jennifer – United Kingdom

data.title: We enjoyed the tour, but not to everyones interest.
data.message:
Impressive structure of 1930's National socialism architecture. I think the tour could have been improved by a short video presentation showing archives and the Berlin airlift.
From the nearest Ubahn we found the meeting point hard to find, we had to ask a number of times for its location. Better directions on the ticket would have been helpful.
Overall enjoyed the experience.
data.author: Trevor – United Kingdom

data.title: Excellent tour!
data.message: Wonderful tour! The tour guide was very knowledgeable!
data.author: Peter – United States

data.title: Historically ample and interesting tour to a magnificent building.
data.message: The guide took good care at taking us all around this impressive Nazzi-built airport building and providing the neccessary historical details on the events related to the site and more. We got to see some historical photos as well as hear testimonies of the soldiers that, say, participated in Berlin airlift and lived to tell their stories personally to the Tempelhof tour guide. It is a real highlight not to miss in the middle of Berlin.
data.author: Dominykas – Lithuania

data.title: Legendary airport
data.message: Interesting tour; guide was pleasant and knowledgable
data.author: Atish – United States

data.title: Outstanding!
data.message: Outstanding
data.author: GEORGIOS – Greece

data.title: absolute fantastic tour
data.message: Great guide, amazing building
data.author: Petra – Waiblingen, Germany

data.title: Fascinating tour of extraordinary building
data.message: Thoroughly enjoyed this guided tour behind the scenes, onto the roof and into the depths of the airport building. Very knowledgeable guide got lots of information across with touches of humour and across in excellent English. Fascinating two hours - could have been even longer.
data.author: Tom – United Kingdom

data.title: Great tour of fantastic building
data.message: The guide was great and the tour was good
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – London, United Kingdom

data.title: Excellent experience really glad I booked the tour
data.message: Value for money this is a must.
data.author: William – United Kingdom

data.title: Great tour!
data.message: Great tour, got to know many secrets and the history behind the Airport. Definitely worth the money
data.author: Joao

data.title: What a history!
data.message: How many stories this building could tell, even now with all of te refugees! A very nice and interesting tour in English by Tom.
data.author: Remco – Netherlands

data.title: Very interesting
data.message: Céline was a very knowledgeable guide through the history and architecture of Tempelhof. She navigated our group through the huge airport building and kept the attention high with a lot of interesting historical anecdotes.
data.author: Matteo – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Passionate guide - amazing building.
data.message: Loved it! 2 hrs well spent. There were quite a few in the group, but the guide was excellent. Fascinating building - like stepping back in time.
data.author: Andrew – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Awesome!!!!
data.message:
highly recommended - what an amazing building and history

friendly and knowledgable guide and easy to comprehend in English
data.author: Paul – Australia

data.title: Informative, interesting, the right pace and length
data.message: Our guide Celine spoke perfect English and knew her stuff. All questions were answered, she remembered mine from early on by illustrating the answer at the end, two hours later.
data.author: Coralie – Sandhurst, United Kingdom

data.title: Amazing!
data.message: Great place to visit. Guide was super informative and very nice
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Fascinating old airport
data.message: Wonderful building so full of history and tour is insightful and just the right length
data.author: Gary – Kettering, United Kingdom

data.title: Amazing!
data.message: It was a fantastic and interesting tour. The guide was excellent. It's mandatory to do it if you're visiting Berlin!
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Well Structured Tour to Unusual Places
data.message: The Tempelhof People are keen to promote the mothballed airport and its amazing history. This is one of two tours run. This one focuses more on the above ground facilities including the main Departures Hall and a Rooftop visit. Well worth the money and the number of stairs keeps you fit.
data.author: Michael – Duncraig, Australia

data.title: Excellent tour for anyone who is interested in Berlin history
data.message: The meeting point was easy to find - its the GAT building. The guide spoke perfect english and was very interesting and open to questions. The tour involves a lot of walking but the 2 hours duration is just perfect. You get to discover a lot about this building and you get to learn a lot about Nazi Germany, and about the the divided Berlin. Its a great way to spend an afternoon - specially when its cold/rainy outside.
data.author: Rui – Lisboa, Portugal

data.title: Alot more to see than you think!
data.message:
This tour was great, a lot more to see than I expected. Some hidden gems and a great two hour tour. Our guide Hans was incredibly knowledgeable and exciting to listen to. Great time, would recommend to anyone.

Advice: get the U6 from Friedrichstr to Paradestr the GAT (General Aviation Terminal) is a short walk from there. Once you get to the GAT door, go in and enter the first room on your left. This will have two desks and is where you sign in for the tour. You can also wait inside if you arrive to early.
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Southampton, United Kingdom

data.title: A great look at a piece of Berlin History
data.message: The tour was very interesting and well conducted. The guide was friendly and informative and the site itself is pretty fascinating. It would have been better to have seen a few more "airport-y" things.
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – London, United Kingdom

data.title: Great!
data.message: Everything was great, the guide knew what she was talking about and made it an interesting tour! would recommend to everyone to go for it
data.author: Kruno – Berlin, Germany

data.title: A brilliant experience
data.message: This tour more than met my expectations. The guide spoke excellent English and was very knowledgable and able to answer any questions. The airport itself was remarkable, historic and atmospheric
data.author: PHILIP – LANDSCOVE, United Kingdom

data.title: Awesome, highlight of Berlin for me!
data.message: A great tour I'd highly recommend. If your into military history, architecture, aviation or underground/bunker exploring this is for you. Found it very interesting, great well informed English speaking guide and fast paced with the 2hrs flying by.
data.author: Martin – Reading, United Kingdom

data.title: Informative and interesting tour of the old airport
data.message:
Informative and interesting tour of the old airport.

Wear comfortable shoes, and don't be scared of climbing stairs!
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Watford, United Kingdom

data.title: Very interesting visit
data.message: Very good - a wide range of buildings visited with details of history as well. Great going onto the roof and the underground bunkers. Our guide in English was really good.
data.author: Sylvia – Liverpool, United Kingdom

data.title: Excellent guide.
data.message: Very well explained, not too many dates and numbers, but just enough and perfect to understand. Good stories and anecdotes. Time flies in Tempelhof ;)
data.author: Rafael – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Well worth the visit
data.message:
The location of the tour assembly point could have been better described and indeed sign posted at the site.

Otherwise very good
data.author: Archie – London, United Kingdom

data.title: Awesome!
data.message: Great tour! The guide explained really well the history of the airport and made the tour really interesting.
data.author: Giorgio – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Book with confidence
data.message:
Excellent tour with guide to match.
Highly recommended.
data.author: alec – bellshill, United Kingdom

data.title: Great tour!!
data.message: Great tour, we enjoyed it greatly
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer

data.title: Just great!
data.message: The tour was great: the airport is an amazing place full of history and the guide was fantastic! This is something you can only do if you take a guided tour and it's 100% worthy!
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Berlin, Germany

data.title: A walk in the history of Berlin, very informative
data.message:
Being inside a building so involved in our history is really interesting. The tour gives the chance not only to learn more, but also to visit rooms and areas that one could never visit on his own.
Don't hesitate, just book it!
data.author: Serena – Berlin, Germany

data.title: great tour, great guide, very informative, great afternoon out
data.message: old school airport, with charm and character
data.author: martin – reading, United Kingdom

data.title: We found the tour both interesting and enlightening.
data.message: The tour was well organised and the guide was very knowledgeable. We really enjoyed this trip.
data.author: david – birmingham, United Kingdom

data.title: Fascinating tour and lovely, knowledgable guide!
data.message: Excellent. Fascinating tour and lovely, knowledgable guide!
data.author: Katherine – Monkstown, Ireland

data.title: Best historical tour in Berlin!
data.message: This tour gave me everything I wanted from a tour of the more offbeat old buildings in Berlin. I'd looked upon the airport with awe and intrigue during all my presvious visits to the city and had always meant to visit - it did not disappoint! The only negative was that you barely scrape the surface of the building, considering just how many rooms it has, but naturally a tour that shows every room would be nigh on impossible. Also expect to walk lots, and there are only a couple of lifts in the building, so perhaps not the best for those who require a wheelchair, however the staff are lovely and I'm sure with advanced knowledge of your requirements they would be able to cater to your needs.
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Carnbo, United Kingdom

data.title: Berlin Tempelhof is by far one of the most interesting places to visit
data.message: Very impressive architecture and interesting history.
data.author: OLE – Skodsborg, Denmark

data.title: Very informative
data.message: I enjoyed the tour and found it very informative. Disappointed that the main hall was closed to the tour, as an event was being organised. The tour I was in, was very large and unfortunately at times, it was difficult to hear the guide. I would recommend the tour.
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Girvan, United Kingdom

data.title: Insightful, informative, entertaining!
data.message: This was a great way to spend a Sunday afternoon. The guide was extremely engaging and shared a wealth of information with us. Not only did we learn about the airport itself but its role in Berlin's complex history. I'd definitely recommend it!
data.author: Emily – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Excellent tour with a very knowledgeable guide
data.message:
I came especially from England to do this and I wasn't disappointed.
The comprehensive tour was really interesting. The guide was friendly and extremely knowledgeable and he obviously enjoyed telling people about this fascinating place. Not to be missed.
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Harrogate, United Kingdom

data.title: HOMECOMING
data.message: I was stationed at and lived at Templehof Airport building from 1960 to 1964. This was my first "homecoming" . The guide was extremely well read on her subject and was able to present her material in an interesting manner. My only complaint was that my former room was unavailable due to remodeling, but that is progress and of course to be expected after all these years. For me this tour was intensely personal and these tour frequently aroused many fond memories.
data.author: JAMES – EL PASO, United States

data.title: Great
data.message:
From booking the tour until the end of the tour everything went smoothly.

The guide was excellent and had great knowledge.

Although the group was quite big he managed to guide is easily.

Recommended to everyone who is visiting Berlin and/or living here since the building represents the cities' history like no other.
data.author: Philipp – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Great tour of a fascinating building.
data.message:
For a long time I have been curious to see the interior of the Tempelhofer building, and learn about its history. This tour totally exceeded my expectations, as there are many interesting areas and I felt that we were given amazing access. The best part was that our tour guide was very knowledgable, and obviously passionate about the history of Tempelhof.

One minor inconvenience was that there was an exhibition disrupting the regular meeting place that I was directed to by my online booking, and there was no signage to help me find the new meeting place.
data.author: Kyle – Salmon Arm, Canada

data.title: iconic building, iconic city.
data.message: Fascinating look behind the scenes of an amazing and iconic building. Students of architecture, engineering, transport and conflict will find this an illuminating and enthralling experience.
data.author: Iain – Glasgow, United Kingdom

data.title: It was great to roam around the building and learn.
data.message: I learned a lot of new facts and the guide was really good.
data.author: Karin – Berlin, Germany

data.title: I highly recommend this tour for locals and visitors!
data.message:
If I have to recommend 1 tour in Berlin, I definitely recommend this one! You enter a gigantic and contemporary place full of history and stories that the guide is happy to tell. 2 hours walking from a hangar to a bomb shelter, from the main terminal to the old american airplane which is still there!
It was definitely amazing to walk into this empty airport and learn more about it.
For berliners and visitors in Berlin, this tour is simply amazing and I definitely highly recommend it!
data.author: Eve – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Loved it
data.message: Great tour
data.author: a GetYourGuide Customer – Berlin, Germany

data.title: Fascinating tour - wouldn't have missed it for the world!
data.message: An afternoon with a difference. The guide was very knowledgeable and made the tour very interesting. We went all over the airport including one of the hangars. Questions were invited and the (large) crowd following the guide gave him their full attention. We had been looking forward to this afternoon for the whole of our trip and weren't disappointed. Indeed, although this was billed as a 2-hour tour, it extended to 2.1/2 hrs.
data.author: Christine – Blairgowrie, United Kingdom

data.title: An impressive piece of recent history that everyone should know about
data.message:
The tour was extremely nice and informative. We were lucky enough to have in our group a former US soldier that was stationed in Tempelhof in the last years of USA's presence. He was very kind to extend the impressive guide's information with first person testimonials and many interesting details.

Lovely afternoon spent learning about our recent history. Suggest after the tour you walk around to the landing strips that are now open to everyone as a park. Really unique place.
data.author: Rodrigo – Berlin, Germany
